# shortcut

**Instance Property**

The shortcut Siri invokes when the user speaks the invocation phrase.

## Declaration

```swift
var shortcut: INShortcut { get }
```

## Discussion

Use the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INVoiceShortcut/shortcut] property to access the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INShortcutReference/intent] or [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INShortcutReference/userActivity] used to create the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INShortcutReference] object.

## Accessing Shortcut Information

- **identifier**: The unique identifier for the shortcut.
- **invocationPhrase**: The phrase the user speaks to invoke the shortcut.
